Text:
Just to confirm, 1.0.4 has an automatic AP25 patch system. Set autofix to level 3 and uncheck fix video padding and games with AP25 should patch fine.

Tested it on AC: B and it patched fine.

http://www.pastebin.ca/2001040 is the final ABGX report. This was run after the autofix did everything. Patched AP25 fine and SSv2.
Lines 35 to 40 in the pastebin are the important ones.
Thx Sunblock I used this last night & can confirm it will patch ap25 automatically! If not ur just wasting DL u still will need the new LT Plus flash
